摘.definition: to take; to pick (flowers, fruit etc); to pluck; to remove; to take off (glasses, hat etc); to select; to pick out; to borrow money at a time of urgent need

摘下.definition: to take off; to remove (one's hat, a door from its hinges etc); to pick (a piece of fruit from a tree etc); (sports) to pick off (a rebound etc)

摘帽.definition: lit. to take off a hat; fig. to be cleared of an unfair charge; rehabilitation

摘帽子.definition: lit. to take off a hat; fig. to be cleared of an unfair charge; rehabilitation

摘桃子.definition: to harvest the fruits of sb else's labor

摘牌.definition: to delist (a traded security); (sports) to accept a transfer-listed player from another club

摘錄.definition: to extract; to excerpt; an excerpt

摘除.definition: to excise; to remove an organ
